elements.name: my-switch
elements.description:
Switches allow the user to toggle an option on or off.

**Slots:**
 - **checked** - Displayed when switched is checked
- **unchecked** - Displayed when switched is unchecked

**Events:**
 - **switch-change** - Emitted whenever the switch is toggled

**CSS Properties:**
 - **--size** - Controls the size of the switch _(default: 1rem)_

**CSS Parts:**
 - **control** - Controls the styles of the button element
- **track** - controls the style of the track
- **switch** - controls the styles of the switch

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: This is used to describe the switch

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: Indicates if the switch is on or off

attributes.name: label-position
attributes.description: Determines the placement of the label in relation to the switch

properties.name: label
properties.description: This is used to describe the switch

properties.name: checked
properties.description: Indicates if the switch is on or off

properties.name: label-position
properties.description: Determines the placement of the label in relation to the switch

events.name: switch-change
events.description: Emitted whenever the switch is toggled

properties.name: --size
properties.description: Controls the size of the switch

pseudo-elements.name: part(control)
pseudo-elements.description: Controls the styles of the button element

pseudo-elements.name: part(track)
pseudo-elements.description: controls the style of the track

pseudo-elements.name: part(switch)
pseudo-elements.description: controls the styles of the switch
